mixed-citation.article-title: Hydroids (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa) from the Vema and Valdivia seamounts (SE Atlantic)

tp:treatment-sec.p: Dianeae rotunda Quoy & Gaimard, 1827: 181–182 , pl. 6a figs 1–2.
Modeeria rotunda – Millard 1975: 137–138, fig. 45a. — Ramil & Vervoort 1992: 29–32 , fig. 4a–b.

Modeeria rotunda is a cosmopolitan species ( Ramil & Vervoort 1992 ; Vervoort 2006 ). In the Southeast Atlantic, it was reported from Namibia ( Gili et al. 1989 ) and also from the east coast of South Africa to Mozambique (Millard 1975). Its bathymetric distribution extends from 0.5 to 1575 m (Gil 2017).
